text: He mominaharu! Allahamathi ra usako rasulamathi ra juna grantha allahale aphno paigambarala'i pradana gareko cha, ra tyasamathi juna granthaharu tyasabhanda agadi utareko thiyo, sabaimathi astha rakha. Ra jasale allaha ra pharistaharu ra usaka granthaharu ra usaka paigambaraharu ra antima dinako inakara gardacha u pathabhrasta bha'i vastavika margabata dherai tadha pugisakeko huncha
